annotations.annotation: Section 31.1(E)(4) is stricken to allow the ability to provide complimentary beverages at the Casino. The amendment was effective May 13, 1998, 63 Fed. Reg. 26621 (1998). Legislative Note: This amendment was not properly incorporated into the Ordinance in 1998. Upon this discovery in 2004 by the Legislative Attorney, this amendment was incorporated into the Ordinance on June 9, 2004.
